title: We’re Sending A Random Group Ride Member Campandgoslow Trout Bar Tape!
content:
If you’ve joined our Group Ride membership, we’re sending out some Campandgoslow Trout Tape to one lucky member today, so check your inbox, Collin Birkett! We’ve got a lot of updates coming for Group Ride this winter, so if you still haven’t joined, please consider signing up today at our Rad Bazaar!

You still have a day to sign up to win the All-City Cosmic Stallion complete!

The post We’re Sending A Random Group Ride Member Campandgoslow Trout Bar Tape! appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
